items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like Imagine Beautiful
items.body: This dress is awesome. It’s beautiful. It’s flirty. It’s not too short and it’s true size.. I love it Read more
items.author: Happy Camper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well!
items.body: This dress is beautiful and fits very well. I’ve gained some weight but was very happy how I felt in this dress. Read more
items.author: laurv

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute!!! Priced a Little High for Product
items.body: I love this dress!!!! It is flowy and very flattering. I like how it's form-fitting at the top and flares out a little at the bottom. Very comfortable, I just sadly had the wrong undies on when I tried it on. I can tell that the way this dress is made allows for some tummy control, which I'm always appreciative of! I wish there were more sparkle to this dress, especially for this price. It literally seems like someone just sprinkled some cheap glitter flakes. I did NOT need a bra with this (i'm a 36G) and did not feel like it needed to be tied extremely tight to achieve a nice supported perky look. Read more
items.author: JonasGirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just beautiful fit great
items.body: Beautiful! I love it! Will buy again. Read more
items.author: Shelby Harvey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty but too revealing of all the wrong things
items.body: Very pretty dress, the sparkles look nice and not cheap. The dress fits very tight, so even if you size up it's going to hug your entire upper torso I ordered in my regular size and can say that this dress is VERY form fitting. It will show every little bump/line. It's like bicycle shorts made into a dress. You're not going to get away with any contouring undergarments. Might as well let it all hang out and be comfortable with it if you're going to buy this one. Read more
items.author: Angie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for curvy body types
items.body: I bought this for my teenage daughter. She has a healthy, curvy body type, and this was very flattering on her. It's hard to find dresses that fit without trying them on first, and we were very happy with this one. Read more
items.author: BookGlow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for the money!!
items.body: Beautiful dress!! Good quality!! I bought this for a cruise and looked amazing. Read more
items.author: MG18

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice stretchy dress.
items.body: It runs slightly large. The photos doesn't do the fabric of the dress any justice. Read more
items.author: Natasha Johnson

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Dustyrose, Navy, Blue, Burgundy, Royalblue, Magenta, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
